Articles.Content: Is there any program that I can use so I can see a .dds file on OS X?

I don't have a mac, but a quick search on the web found this page.

http://www.filetips.org/how-to-open/dds.html

Hope it helps, Sorry if not..

Aces
Yeah, unfortunately those programs are all paid... never mind I have a virtual server on my mac, I just don't want to use it cause it lags

Ok.. Sorry about that.. Wish I had a better answer, but I don't..

Hope it works out!

My best!

Aces
